name: Edward Holmes
text: Called to place an order stayed on hold for 10 minutes finally just hung up. When I got to the place there was only one guy working and he was very busy. So I told him I am not going to add to his problems and told I would be going to Papa John's.

name: Cessie Alvarez
text: I‚Äôve ordered from here a few times but ever since they moved to their new location I‚Äôve had issues. I‚Äôve ordered extra marinara sauce (& paid for it) but they forget to deliver it. Tonight I ordered a pizza with extra sauce and paid for ‚Ä¶More

name: Earlina Cook
text: I had an awesome experience. Customer service and the food was excellent. It took a bit  longer however the food was amazing and hot so that made up for the time it took. Just moved to Villa Rica and will definitely be going back there.

name: C S
text: Kourtney and her team whipped up a fresh batch of breadsticks for us along with tasty large pizza. They were courteous, efficient, and all around fantastic. We will return. Best pizza we have had in a while.

name: SK Ray
text: So glad to finally get a NEW pizza hut. They have a drive up window!! Pizza is better to!!

name: Yoki Akun
text: Always hour and half or more wait. Still have Marcos or dominos

name: Ron Wroblewski
text: Fast delivery. They get our order wrong about every 4th time we go here but the food is great

name: Melissa Helton
text: I ordered at 948pm. Was told it would arrive in about 28mins. I didn't get my pizza until 11pm. Over an hour for an 8 minute drive... On top of that when I called to check the status noone wanted to answer the phone!!!! Never again... I'm done.

name: joel mesic
text: Was given in store credit for the inconvenience they more than made up for what I dealt with! Ordered a pizza and was told 15 minutes ended waiting for about an hour once I got to the store but they were slammed alot of people ordered. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Leah Bridges
text: I placed an order over the phone for delivery at 10:30 last night(6/6). I never received my order. I called the store last night waited 20 minutes for someone to answer the phone. Before I hung up the phone. Today I called again and waited ‚Ä¶More

name: Bonnie Smith
text: Ordered two med even after reading others reviews wanted to see for my self. Absolutely no sauce fortunately I told my husband he asked for extra sauce when he picked up order. Pizza Hut get it together not a good look.

name: Michael Miller
text: Both times we've ordered they have been wrong. One carry out and one delivery. First time they gave us bread sticks in a pizza box, and when I get home and realized I didn't have my pizza it took them over an hour to make my pizza. 2nd time ‚Ä¶More

name: soaps by audrina
text: It was a perfect amount of pizza sauce! I recommend this pizza hut. First time trying it and it was a great experience.

name: Cherry limeade
text: Employees were not wearing gloves! No one! This is absolutely absurd, especially considering that the world is in the middle of a pandemic! Not understanding how it‚Äôs ok to handle food without the proper ppe! I have a list of restaurants that I am reporting!

name: kathy montgomery
text: if I had to rate this 1-10 i‚Äôd say a 10. This pizza is to good to be true!! i‚Äôm not sure why all these people are saying rude things I think this pizza was good.

name: donald doll
text: Friendly service perfect pizza just all around great experience will definitely be back

name: Michael Posey
text: The perfect pizza, always get enough pepperoni and extra sauce on my pizza. First place I choose to order pizza from.

text: Fast, and friendly service!  Delicious pizza! Best in town!

text: Just got home they forgot my wings and they gave me bread stuck instead of cheese bread sticks

text: Ordered two pizzas and wings, they told us that our order was not there and our account was charged. Someone claiming be a manager had an attitude and was very unprofessional in appearance and customer service. Will not be back.
